alert.note: Alert for Bronx; New York (Manhattan); Northern Nassau; Northern Queens; Northern Westchester; Northwest Suffolk; Rockland; Southern Nassau; Southern Queens; Southern Westchester (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 7:20PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Fairfield, Hudson, southeastern Bergen, southern Westchester, Queens, Bronx, west central Suffolk, Rockland, New York (Manhattan) and central Nassau Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 719 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Union City to Little Neck to Melville. Movement was north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jamaica, Yonkers, Stamford, Norwalk, New Rochelle, Flushing, White Plains, Mott Haven, Levittown, Hoboken, East Tremont, Huntington Station, Port Chester, Glen Cove and Bergenfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
